Posts.Content: Thank you! I'm familiar with that site....my husband has prostate cancer. I didn't know they had a breast cancer forum, too. I'll have a look!
Posts.Title: Nashville area - Mother just diagnosed - need surgeon recs

Posts.Content:
Hi All,
My mother was just diagnosed --- results of needle biopsy show a "small" area that needs to be removed. We're in the Nashville area, so I'm looking for surgeon recommendations.
Thanks in advance!
